CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(Contact.Intake_Location__c, 'TS Brockton') && ISPICKVAL(Campaign.Service_Year__c , '2017-2018') && Active__c = True && ISPICKVAL( Education_Status_at_End_Senior__c, 'Grad in standard num yrs (rigorous)') && ISPICKVAL( Grade_Level_at_Start_Non_Adult__c, 'Grade 12 (Senior)') , 'Goal # achieved' , 'Goal # not achieved' )
CustomField.label: DB - TS Brockton - 4B DELETE
